column2: "Mbepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do na mo kurow fapem si."
"EWURADZE dɔ Zion mbobotsen Sen Jakob ne tsenabea nyinara."

column6: Wɔ hɔn a wonyim me mpo a: Oyinom

column4: Oyi ɔno wɔwoo no wɔ no mu; Na Ɔsorsornyi no ankasa na ɔbɛma oetsim."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtow ndwom na hɔn a wɔsaw nyina bɛse dɛ
column3: Mo nsunyiwa nyinara fi wo mu."
